text:
Image:Area code 202.svg|thumb|350px|The area colored red indicates the geographical region of the District of Columbia, served by area code 202
poly 0 50 49 54 103 84 111 88 101 107 118 130 143 139 179 140 211 188 238 203 260 240 259 248 248 250 255 262 253 357 1 357 Area codes 571 and 703
poly 1 1 0 45 52 48 117 84 109 109 121 127 180 136 199 164 254 112 345 204 264 286 258 358 420 358 420 1 Area codes 240 and 301
Area code 202 is an area code for Washington, D.C.. It was one of the first area codes created. It was created by AT&T in October 1947.
